item.description:
Learn about the 9 Enneagram types in depth, what core type you are, personal growth for each type and how to relate to all 9 types. Herb acts out the 9 types with props and hats. Lots of fun and insight about yourself and those important to you.

7:30 pm - 10:00 pm
($40 - Sliding scale to $20.)


Herb has led relationship courses for over 30 years and also is an the personality types expert with a focus on relationship dynamics with over 20 years experience teaching the Enneagram nationwide. He is the author of the Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram, is an individual, couples and family therapist and also does phone sessions (including typing people by phone) using the Enneagram and Myers Briggs as tools for relationship healing and personal growth.

herb@herbpearce.com
www.herbpearce.com
781 648 3737
item.name: Enneagram Basic Workshop
